column8: Pas menutup pintu rundingannya dengan Bersatu selepas parti itu menyertai Pakatan Harapan semalam.Naib Presiden Pas, Datuk Mohd Amar Nik Abdullah berkata tindakan itu dibuat selaras dengan syarat Pas kepada mana-mana pihak yang ingin bekerjasama dengannya iaitu tidak menjalin sebarang hubungan dengan seteru politiknya iaitu DAP dan Parti Amanah Negara (Amanah)."...kira tutup bukulah. Sebab itu pendirian parti, daripada awal pun memang jelas," katanya ketika ditemui pemberita selepas menghadiri persidangan Dun Kelantan di Kompleks Kota Darul Naim di sini, hari ini.Semalam, Pakatan Harapan sebulat suara menerima Bersatu sebagai ahli terbaharu gabungan itu selepas majlis presiden gabungan itu memutuskan perkara tersebut dalam mesyuaratnya di Kuala Lumpur.Ditanya mengenai pertemuan dengan Bersatu sebelum ini, Mohd Amar yang juga Timbalan Menteri Besar Kelantan berkata ia hanya berkisar mengenai pandangan parti itu terhadap beberapa perkara."Sebelum ini kita lebih kepada berbincang, tak ada rundingan betul lagi. Kita hanya berbincang idea-idea, isu-isu...itu sahaja. Tapi belum sampai ke peringkat serius dan muktamad."Kita di peringkat pusat pun, memang asas berunding masa itu ialah selagi Bersatu tidak bersama dengan Pakatan Harapan. Itu yang kita boleh runding. Bila dia (Bersatu) sudah rasmi (sertai Pakatan Harapan), jadi putuslah (hubungan)," katanya. –Bernamahttp://www.sinarharian.com.my/politik/pas-...ersatu-1.647290
Why should God nego / talk with any other party?  LOL
what about PKR? Will Pas contest against PKR in the next GE?

column7: From: Clerking. Data Entry like a Mad Man
column8: Ok PAS can berambus from Selangor and go back to Kelantan. You are no longer acting in the interest of the voters who wanted to fix this country.

Nazri Aziz: There Will Be No Umno-PAS Coalition Government11 Dec 2016https://forum.lowyat.net/topic/4144739Mustapa Mohamed: UMNO Kelantan Yakin Tamatkan Penguasaan 25 Tahun Pas29 Nov 2015https://forum.lowyat.net/topic/3790031Tok Pa: Kelantan Umno's enemy is PASMkini 5 Mar 2017 SoS...'PAS, PKR and Bersatu are our political enemies... MCA and MIC are our friends. That is the reality'...He said that many PAS leaders continue to condemn BN and Prime Minister Najib Abdul Razak...."That is why we have issued the order, declaring political rivalry," he said.Umno: PAS is our enemy in Kelantanthemalaymailonline 5 Mar 2017 SoS...Kelantan Umno chief Datuk Seri Mustapa Mohamed said the "reality" was that the federal opposition parties of PAS, PKR, Amanah and Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia (PPBM) are Umno's political enemies...."Our enemy in Kelantan is PAS," he was quoted saying by local daily The Star.Kelantan Umno all out to wrest control of state in pollsThe Star 5 Mar 2017 SoS...The declaration made by state Umno chief Datuk Seri Mustapa Mohamed ended months of speculation of a possible political collaboration between the two parties at the national level....“PAS, PKR, Amanah and flower (referring to the flower symbol of Parti Pribumi Bersatu Malaysia) are our political enemies....“MCA, MIC (and other component parties) are our friends....“That is the reality,” he said after addressing 1,500 Barisan Nasional representatives from 534 polling districts here yesterday....“Our enemy in Kelantan is PAS,” he added....Kelantan Mentri Besar Datuk Ahmad Yakob had during a cera­mah on Friday night chided Umno leaders for claiming that they had to wrest control of the state for the sake of the rakyat....Describing such statements as “embarrassing”, Ahmad claimed that it was Barisan’s policies, inclu­ding the Goods and Services Tax, that had burdened the people.
